fulltext:
PHAN THI HUYNH THUONG 
EXPERIENCES: 
July 2017 – Present: Technical Recruiter at Unit Corporation (Software Solution – Around 
160 employees) 
Job Description: 
 Posting job, searching & screening CVs, making call's interview with some positions such as 
(Java Developer, .NET Developer (ASP.NET, VB.NET, Sharepoint), Mobile Developer (React 
Native, iOS, Android), Tester, Business Analyst...
 Scheduling interviews for managers and candidates;
 Salary negotiating & drafting offer letters;
 Reporting recruitment status to Manager;
 Extend recruiting network & building up database;
 Building up all recruitment's forms, recruitment process;
 Contacting with all recruiting service providers such as Itviec, Vietnamworks, TopCV; 
manage cost & budget for recruitment activities per year;
 Managing job posting in all recruitment channels;
 Working with some universities to organize job fairs;
 Supporting other activities such as take care of employees & organize some events.
Achievements: 
 Exceeding the recruitment target every month.
November 2015 – July 2017: Recruitment Specialist at American General Construction 
(Construction Field – Around 600 employees) 
Job Description: 
 
Analyzing recruitment needs based on recruitment requests from all departments & 
quarterly, yearly recruitment plans, drafting the Job Description;
 Contacting & choosing the suitable solutions from the suppliers for recruitment plans such 
as headhunters, job posting services include Vietnamworks, Careerbuilder, Timviecnhanh; 
Searching & hunting some suitable candidates for some vacant positions at AGC;
 Drafting & finishing some tests as IQ, Computer Skills;
 Interviewing all positions as entry-level, staff & leader & scheduling all interviews for HR 
Manager, HR Director & Heads of Department; 
 Planning & organizing the job fair at University of Technology; 
 Doing weekly/ monthly/ yearly reports to update Recruitment Status; 
 Making orientation to welcome new employees; 
 Supporting in preparation process for Year End Party 2015. 
Achievements: 
 Salary Review: 4 times within 15 months (from November 2015 to April 2017) 
 Promotion: Has been promoted to the post of Recruitment Specialist (from May 2017); 
 Recruitment Performance: Around 43 new hires per month. 
January 2015 – June 2015: Administration Staff & Assistant to CP&A Manager at 
Commercial Planning & Activation Department at Diageo Vietnam Limited. 
 Do some reports for my line-manager; 
 Raise PR, PO, and GR (Include Invoice & No Invoice), Close PO…; 
 Organize workshop for PS, summary reports, surveys from PS; 
 Make plans & follow up the process collect, return booths from North and South; 
 Check liquidations, transportation of PS and Team Leader; 
 Prepare vendors pool for F16; 
 Site check, book venue, prepare checklist logistics for SCPM F16; 
 Others task from line manager. 
SKILLS: 
 Presentation, Communication, Organize a meeting, Writing skill (articles, blog) 
 Good at MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet, Proshow Producer, Picasa, Photograph 
 Teamwork and leadership 
EDUCATION: 
 2014 – 2016: Study English with Reflex Method at Outerspace Language School. 
 2010 – 2014: University of Economic Ho Chi Minh city. 
o Major in Human Resources Management 
 2013: Has completed the training course of Professional Personnel Administration. 
 2013:    Has    successfully    completed    the  course   on Labor   Legislation, Advanced 
Information Technology Office. 
EXTRACIRRICULAR ACTIVITIVES: 
 January 2012 – March 2014: Agent of content department, Human Resource Apprentice 
Club (HuReA Club). 
- 
Interviews to recruit collaborators, club members and executives 
- 
Organizing some meetings, conferences and contests in Human Resources Management such 
as “Prism Recruitment”, “Impressive CV”, “HR Matrix Reveal 1st”… Writing articles for 
competition, workshops published in the newspapers such as vn.express, youth and many 
forums. 
Phan Thi Huynh Thuong   Page 2
